Title: The Wedding Banquet
Writer: Ang Lee, Neil Peng, James Schamus
Actors: Ya-lei Kuei, Sihung Lung, May Chin, Winston Chao
Plot: To satisfy his nagging parents, a gay landlord and a female tenant agree to a marriage of convenience, but his parents arrive to visit and things get out of hand.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 12 wins & 7 nominations.
